Uses of Interface
com.rs.seagull.emulator.api.StartupInformationListener

  • Uses of StartupInformationListener in com.rs.seagull.emulator.api

    Subinterfaces of StartupInformationListener in com.rs.seagull.emulator.api
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static interface 
    StartupInformationListener.Ibm3270
    This interface describes a startup information listener for an IBM 3270 host session.
    static interface 
    StartupInformationListener.Ibm5250
    This interface describes a startup information listener for an IBM 5250 host session.
    Classes in com.rs.seagull.emulator.api that implement StartupInformationListener
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Ibm3270StartupInformationAdapter
    This class implements 3270 StartupInformationListener, but does not do anything.
    class 
    Ibm3270StartupInformationLogger
    This class implements 3270 StartupInformationListener, so it can log every change to the logging infrastructure.
    class 
    Ibm5250StartupInformationAdapter
    This class implements 5250 StartupInformationListener, but does not do anything.
    class 
    Ibm5250StartupInformationLogger
    This class implements 5250 StartupInformationListener, so it can log every change to the logging infrastructure.
    Methods in com.rs.seagull.emulator.api with parameters of type StartupInformationListener
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    BareSession.addStartupInformationListener(StartupInformationListener listener)
    Add the provided listener, so it will get notified of changes in the startup information.
    void
    BareSession.removeStartupInformationListener(StartupInformationListener listener)
    Remove the provided listener, so it will no longer get notified of changes in the startup information.
